flawed_nl_solution:
Emma’s sister is 7 + 9 = <<7+9=19>>19 years old.
In this many years, Emma’s sister will be 56 years old: 56 - 19 = <<56-19=37>>37 years.
When her sister is 56 years old, Emma will be 7 + 37 = <<7+37=44>>44 years.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
